About

On behalf of Minsk front-end/JavaScript community, The RS crew is glad to announce the upcoming The Rolling Scopes front-end conference! Previous ones were too good to do it again. Let’s Roll!

The Rolling Scopes Conference

Follow us on Twitter or Facebook to learn about the tickets and other news first!

Watch Minsk time-laps video.

The lagest JavaScript/Front-end conference in Belarus. Two full days of delicious content for amazing people of the front-end scene.
